column1: Little Goat Diner////One of the most fun brunches I've ever had. While you wait for the table
column2: go to the back and grab a Bloody Mary or a cup of joe. They sell house mad pastries also
column3: and have a giant window that you can watch where these pastries come from (they're production program.) The burgers are great
column4: like their Korean style kimchi burger. French toast was amazing. Before you leave
column5: be sure to take a seat in the photo booth
column6: so you can take Little Goat with you wherever you go.
